author: Jordan Oloman
title: Resident Evil 3 Physical Copies Could Be Delayed in Europe
description: Capcom is in frequent communication with its distribution partners to try and ensure the game's availability.
content: Resident Evil 3's physical release could be delayed in Europe, Capcom has announced.The news comes from the Capcom UK Twitter feed, which explained how the launch of the game could be affected by the ongoing COVID-19 crisis.Please take a moment to read this m… [+1350 chars]
